revisions.rev:
'''5th AFCA Awards'''
---- Best Film:
''''' The Hurt Locker '''''
The '''5th Austin Film Critics Association Awards''' honored the best filmmaking of [[2009 in film|2009]]. ==Top 10 Films== #''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' #''[[Star Trek (film)|Star Trek]]'' #''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' #''[[A Serious Man]]'' #''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' #''[[Avatar (2009 film)|Avatar]]'' #''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' #''[[District 9]]'' #''[[Where the Wild Things Are (film)|Where the Wild Things Are]]'' #(tie) ''[[Moon (film)|Moon]]'' and ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'' ==Winners== *'''Best Actor:''' **[[Colin Firth]] - ''[[A Single Man (2009 film)|A Single Man]]'' *'''Best Actress:''' **[[MÃ©lanie Laurent]] - ''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *'''Best Animated Feature:''' **''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' *'''Best Cinematography:''' **[[Barry Ackroyd]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *'''Best Director:''' **[[Kathryn Bigelow]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *'''Best Documentary Feature:''' **''[[Anvil! The Story of Anvil]]'' *'''Best Film:''' **''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *'''Best First Film:''' **''[[District 9]]'' - [[Neill Blomkamp]] *'''Best Foreign Language Film:''' **''[[Sin Nombre (2009 film)|Sin Nombre]]'', [[Spain]] *'''Best Original Score:''' **''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' - [[Michael Giacchino]] *'''Best Supporting Actor:''' **[[Christoph Waltz]] - ''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *'''Best Supporting Actress:''' **[[Anna Kendrick]] - ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *'''Best Screenplay - Adapted:''' **''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' - [[Jason Reitman]] and [[Sheldon Turner]] *'''Best Screenplay - Original:''' **''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' - [[Quentin Tarantino]] *'''Breakthrough Artist Award:''' **[[Christian McKay]] - ''[[Me and Orson Welles]]'' *'''Austin Film Award:''' **''[[Me and Orson Welles]]'' - [[Richard Linklater]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:2009 film awards]] [[ja:ç¬¬5åãªã¼ã¹ãã£ã³æ ç»æ¹è©å®¶åä¼è³]]
